name: Mageterian
description:
JUST KILL AND RUN!

Tutorial:
W  - up
A - left
S - down
D - right

Press J to use normal attacks to enemy.

Press K to use powerful skills.

ps: This game was made in a rush for the game jam. There are a lot of bugs you might encounter, and a lack of features. I hope you'll have fun playing Mageterian.
